description: A selection of projects I have worked on.

pr-3.title: Real estate platform
pr-3.description: A real estate management and exchange platform, allowing individuals and professionals to rent, buy or sell properties such as apartments, villas, houses or land.

pr-2.title: Audio streaming application
pr-2.description: An online application that allows you to listen to live radio stations and podcasts on demand, all accessible from any connected device.

pr-1.title: Complete e-commerce platform
pr-1.description: E-commerce platform with clothing purchasing, order management, deliveries and a complete admin dashboard.
